channel.title: Teleport emote when teleporting?

item.title: Teleport emote when teleporting?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

`Rich:

You have to use multiple delays to make it do the emote, graphic, then teleport you. Also, use emote 715 for the ending teleport animation.

Ugh. How would I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport emote when teleporting?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Whenever I actually get the emote in, My character does the emote and teles there but he gets stuck in the little purple ball…

Half the time I try, My char doesn’t even do the emote…
This is how my code is set up:

case 4140:
                if (teleblock == true) { // Made by Owner Raver
                    sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
                } else {
		if (actionTimer == 0) { 
                    setAnimation(714);
                    teleportToX = 3087;
		    teleportToY = 3494;
		    sendMessage("You teleport back to Edgeville.");
		actionTimer = 10;
                	}
		}
                break;

Read full topic
